It seems this version might have problems with vista. For myself, it ran the first few times, then it stopped loading any video. It would just stay black, but I could still roll over the menu options and still hear the sounds and music. 

Anyways, the solution is apparently to set the compatibility mode to windows 98/me on the main exe.
